Darkstrider Ambush.name: Darkstrider Ambush
Darkstrider Ambush.flavor: You exploit your advantage with a single well-aimed strike that momentarily disorients your enemy.
Darkstrider Ambush.target: One creature granting combat advantage to you
Darkstrider Ambush.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier (melee) or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier (ranged) damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Death in the Dark.name: Death in the Dark
Death in the Dark.flavor: With uncanny precision, you lash out at your enemy’s head, seeking to blind the foe.
Death in the Dark.attack: Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) vs. AC. The attack ignores concealment but not total concealment.
Death in the Dark.onHit: 3[W] + Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) modifier damage, and the target is blinded and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).

Cloaked in Shadow.name: Cloaked in Shadow
Cloaked in Shadow.flavor: You vanish into the shadowy clefts of the natural rock and stone around you.
Cloaked in Shadow.requirement: You must be adjacent to a wall or other large stone feature, such as a column, a boulder, or a stalagmite.
Cloaked in Shadow.effect: You are hidden to any enemies that aren’t adjacent to you. You remain hidden until you move or attack.
